attributes.additional_details: Whatever cultural differences it is an act of war/incitement to remove the flag of the country whose people remain stateless by mp/councillars having powers with no committment to the n.i. Arrest for incitement.remove ms villers/police in command for permitting.the flag belongs to the population and not a voting issue.but it will be in future when it is romanian /polish/lituavan councillar who likewise follow conduct.THE NORTHERN IRISH are a GOOD PEOPLE who deserve better.
